rukus.text: hamane aakaash mein burj (taara-samooh) banae aur hamane use dekhanevaalon ke lie susajjit bhee kiya
aur har phitakaare hue shaitaan se use surakshit rakha
yah aur baat hai ki kisee ne choree-chhipe kuchh sunagun le liya to ek pratyaksh agnishikha ne bhee jhapatakar usaka peechha kiya
aur hamane dharatee ko phailaaya aur usamen atal pahaad daal die aur usamen har cheez nape-tule andaaz mein ugaee
aur usamen tumhaare guzar-basar ke saamaan nirmit kie, aur unako bhee jinako rozee denevaale tum nahin ho
koee bhee cheez to aisee nahin hai jisake bhandaar hamaare paas na hon, phir bhee ham use ek gyaat (nishchint) maatra ke saath utaarate hai
ham hee varsha laanevaalee havaon ko bhejate hai. phir aakaash se paanee barasaate hai aur usase tumhen sinchit karate hai. usake khajaanaadaar tum nahin ho
ham hee jeevan aur mrtyu dete hai aur ham hee uttaraadhikaaree rah jaate hai
ham tumhaare pahale ke logon ko bhee jaanate hai aur baad ke aanevaalon ko bhee ham jaanate hai
tumhaara rab hee hai, jo unhen ikattha karega. nissandeh vah tatvadarshee, sarvagy hai
